  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.smodel.TreeNodeParamProvider
    unused, just remove its uses, if any
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    jetbrains.mps.fileTypes.MPSFileTypesManager
    this class has very limited perspective on what files are module/model (sticks to predefined set of filename extensions), do not use
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.filechoosers.treefilechooser.TreeFileChooser
    use FileChooser, FileChooserDescriptor and FileChooserDescriptorFactory instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.smodel.SModelEventsDispatcher
    Dispatches events using legacy SModelEvent classes and there's only 1 use (TreeStructureUpdate) which doesn't justify its existence User: Alexander Shatalin Date: 16.04.2010
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.SortUtil
    extract comparators, use them directly where needed and get rid of this class
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.IdeaFileSystem
    jetbrains.mps.project.MementoWithFS
    model root factory will pass module to the constructor of any model root
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModuleContext
    shall cease along with IOperationContext
    jetbrains.mps.project.ProjectOperationContext
    see IOperationContext
    jetbrains.mps.typesystem.uiActions.TypecheckerStateView
    not functional and will be removed
    jetbrains.mps.typesystem.uiActions.TypecheckerStateViewComponent
    not functional and will be removed
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    jetbrains.mps.icons.MPSIcons.ToolWindows.ClassHierarchyView
    jetbrains.mps.ide.actions.MPSCommonDataKeys.OPERATION_CONTEXT
    IOperationContext has been deprecated and will be removed in the next release
    jetbrains.mps.ide.blame.perform.Query.ANONYMOUS
    use Query.getAnonymousQuery() instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.view.treeholder.treeview.path.PathItemRole.ROLE_CATEGORY
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.view.treeholder.treeview.ViewOptions.myCategory
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons.GROUP_ASPECTS_ICON
    use MPSIcons.Nodes.Models.AspectModel instead
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons.OUTPUT
    use MPSIcons.Generator.Output instead
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons.SORT_NODES_BY_ASPECT_ICON
    use AllIcons.ObjectBrowser.SortByType instead
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    jetbrains.mps.ide.blame.command.Command.getVersion()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.blame.dialog.BlameDialog.addEx​(Throwable)
    use BlameDialog.addExceptions(java.util.Collection) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.blame.dialog.BlameDialog.setSourceRevision​(String)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.view.UsagesViewTool.findUsages​(IResultProvider, SearchQuery, boolean, boolean, boolean, String)
    Use UsagesViewTool.showUsages(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.model.IResultProvider, jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.model.SearchQuery, UsageToolOptions) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.messages.MessagesViewTool.getAvailableList​(String, boolean)
    I don't feel it's a nice idea to expose implementation detail, MessagesViewTool.newHandler() shall suffice, perhaps, augmented with options object to pass info/warn/clear settings
    jetbrains.mps.ide.MPSCoreComponents.getModuleRepository()
    it's our implementation part, shall drop once no uses
    jetbrains.mps.ide.platform.ui.CheckBoxNodeRenderer.NodeData.getIcon​(boolean)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.project.ProjectHelper.toIdeaProject​(Project)
    use MPSProject.getProject() instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.project.ProjectHelper.toMPSProject​(Project)
    use ProjectHelper.fromIdeaProject(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.favorites.root.FavoritesRoot.getAvailableNodes()
    dubious contract, single use (abandoned), no reason to keep.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.ProjectTree.expandProjectNode()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.NewRootNodeAction.trySelectInCurrentPane​(Project, SNode)
    use NewRootNodeAction.trySelectInCurrentPane(Project, SNode) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTree.getChildrenComparator()
    Poor contract (despite being in MPSTree context, the comparator is expected to sort user objects, not MPSTreeNode), single use
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getIcon​(boolean)
    use MPSTreeNode.getIcon() instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.iterator()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.setIcon​(Icon, boolean)
    use MPSTreeNode.setIcon(javax.swing.Icon) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.updatePresentation​(boolean, boolean)
    odd and unclear contract (e.g. MPSTreeNode.update() and MPSTreeNode.updateSubTree() imply structure refresh, while this one does not), parameters that merely control invocation of other public methods. Use respective methods directly, instead.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.getOrCreateVirtualFile​(IFile)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.getVirtualFile​(IFile)
    please use VirtualFileUtils.getProjectVirtualFile(IFile) or [if absolutely needed] VirtualFileUtils.getOrCreateVirtualFile(IFile)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.toIFile​(VirtualFile)
    Prefer IdeaFileSystem.fromVirtualFile(VirtualFile) instead. This method relies on global FS singleton.
    jetbrains.mps.library.LibraryInitializer.getModuleHandles()
    jetbrains.mps.library.LibraryInitializer.loadRefreshed​(List<LibraryContributor>)
    use LibraryInitializer.load(List) instead
    jetbrains.mps.library.LibraryInitializer.update()
    please use one-step loading methods: LibraryInitializer.loadRefreshed(java.util.List<jetbrains.mps.library.contributor.LibraryContributor>) or LibraryInitializer.load(java.util.List<jetbrains.mps.library.contributor.LibraryContributor>)
    jetbrains.mps.plugins.actions.GeneratedActionGroup.addAction​(String)
    jetbrains.mps.plugins.actions.GeneratedActionGroup.addParameterizedAction​(BaseAction, PluginId, Object...)
    jetbrains.mps.project.dependency.GlobalModuleDependenciesManager.getOnlyReexportModules()
    one usage does not justify method's existence
    jetbrains.mps.project.dependency.GlobalModuleDependenciesManager.getUsedLanguages()
    Use SModule.getUsedLanguages() directly.
    jetbrains.mps.project.FileBasedProject.getProjectFile()
    must return IFile todo not so sure now AP
    jetbrains.mps.project.GlobalScope.getInstance()
    there ain't no such thing as 'global' scope, use GlobalScope(SRepository)
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.AutoImportsContributor.getApplicableSModuleClass()
    Use generic ModelsAutoImportsManager.AutoImportsContributor.isApplicable(SModule) instead, and stop parameterising the class with ModuleType, it's to be removed after 2018.3 (signature of all the methods of this class will use SModule then). It's not possible to change ModuleType contextModule to SModule contextModule right away as it breaks compile-time code compatibility.
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.doAutoImport​(SModule, SModel)
    use ComponentHost.findComponent(Class) and instance method ModelsAutoImportsManager.performImports(SModule, SModel) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.getAutoImportedModels​(SModule, SModel)
    use ComponentHost.findComponent(Class) and instance method ModelsAutoImportsManager.getModelsToImport(SModule, SModel) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.getDevKits​(SModule, SModel)
    use ComponentHost.findComponent(Class) and instance method ModelsAutoImportsManager.getDevkitsToImport(SModule, SModel) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.getLanguages​(SModule, SModel)
    use ComponentHost.findComponent(Class) and instance method ModelsAutoImportsManager.getLanguagesToImport(SModule, SModel) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.registerContributor​(ModelsAutoImportsManager.AutoImportsContributor)
    use ComponentHost.findComponent(Class) and instance method ModelsAutoImportsManager.register(AutoImportsContributor) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.ModelsAutoImportsManager.unregisterContributor​(ModelsAutoImportsManager.AutoImportsContributor)
    use ComponentHost.findComponent(Class) and instance method ModelsAutoImportsManager.unregister(AutoImportsContributor) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.OptimizeImportsHelper.optimizeModelsImports​(List<SModel>)
    use OptimizeImportsHelper.optimizeModelsImports(List, ProgressMonitor)
    jetbrains.mps.project.OptimizeImportsHelper.optimizeProjectImports​(Project)
    use OptimizeImportsHelper.optimizeProjectImports(Project, ProgressMonitor) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.PathMacros.getInstance()
    it is a CoreComponent, one can get it from MPSPlatform
    jetbrains.mps.project.Project.getModules()
    use {@link #getProjectModules)} instead AP fixme : why to return Iterable? isn't it easier to give out a collection, e.g. a list?
    jetbrains.mps.project.Project.getModulesWithGenerators()
    use Project.getProjectModulesWithGenerators() instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.Project.getProjectFile()
    the project is not necessarily backed up by file. Left for compatibility
    jetbrains.mps.project.SModuleOperations.createModelWithAdjustments​(String, ModelRoot, ModelFactoryType)
    to become private, don't use
    jetbrains.mps.project.SModuleOperations.getOutputPathFor​(SModel)
    use GenerationTargetFacet.getOutputLocation(SModel) or JavaModuleFacet.getOutputRoot(). Even #getOutputRoot(SModel) is much better as it (a) deals with IFile (b) hints it's root, not model-specific location
    jetbrains.mps.project.SModuleOperations.getOutputRoots​(SModule)
    This operation knows about output roots of JavaModuleFacet and TestsFacet only. Locations of any other GenerationTargetFacet are ignored. There's only 1 use in MPS. Client code shall not assume there's single output root for a module, there could be multiple outputs, specified per model.
    jetbrains.mps.project.SModuleOperations.reloadFromDisk​(AbstractModule)
    module provider (library, project, whatever) has to deal with module reload, this helper complicates matters more than resolves any. Once it's gone, AM.loadDescriptor is no longer needed, as well as MM.loadModuleHandle() Reads module from file and eventually redeploys it (when CLManager triggers refresh)
    jetbrains.mps.project.StandaloneMPSProject.getErrors()
    remove in 3.4 and make final
    jetbrains.mps.reloading.ClassBytesProvider.getClass​(String)
    jetbrains.mps.reloading.IClassPathItem.getAvailableClasses​(String)
    the only distinction between this method and IClassPathItem.getRootClasses(String) is that this one gives inner classes, but is it something anyone care about? The only use of this method (getAvailableClasses().iterator().hasNext()) would work the same with getRootClasses (inner classes could not be there it there are no outer)
    jetbrains.mps.reloading.IClassPathItem.getRootClasses​(String)
    The only client of this method doesn't seem to be really bound to particular iteration order and could live with API like getAllClasses()
    jetbrains.mps.reloading.IClassPathItem.getSubpackages​(String)
    there are 2 uses of the method, 1 is to be replaced with IClassPathItem.hasPackage(String), another shall get refactored as there's no need in specific iteration order
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    jetbrains.mps.FilteredGlobalScope()
    this cons assumes single global repository, which is a non-existent thing. Use FilteredGlobalScope(SRepository) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.model.scopes.GlobalScope()
    use GlobalScope(Project) instead. There are no more uses in MPS, please don't introduce any new one. However, we have to keep this code fore fe releases as there's 'execute finders' expression, which defaults to use of this scope when none is specified. Though we warn about unspecified scope now, it's unlikely to trigger prompt fixes in our clients. We need to change generator to use something more reasonable than new GS(), but I failed to come up with an idea what would it be (ProjectManager.allOpenProjects.collect(p->p.repo)?).
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.smodel.SNodeGroupTreeNode​(SModelTreeNode, String, boolean)
    use SNodeGroupTreeNode(SModelReference, String, boolean) counterpart
    jetbrains.mps.library.ModulesMiner()
    use ModulesMiner(Collection, DescriptorIOFacade) instead
    jetbrains.mps.project.Project​(String, Function<Project, ProjectRepository>)
    this is an ugly way to pass Project instance into ProjectRepository cons
